job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Software Engineer, gt.school (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional software engineering tasks like building web applications and enhancing cloud-native backends. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies, making it not relevant to AI-focused roles.

phrases: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns
Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe core software development activities, including building applications, working with backend systems and cloud patterns, and ensuring code quality.

phrases: Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
job_tasks.justification: Although framed as something the candidate will NOT be doing, this phrase implies an understanding of infrastructure management and product stability, which are aspects of operations engineering.

phrases: Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
soft_skills.justification: Code review implies communication of standards and requirements, and ensuring adherence suggests collaboration with the team and understanding customer needs.

phrases: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns
Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
soft_skills.justification: The focus on 'top-notch libraries and tools', 'latest serverless cloud patterns', and the explicit avoidance of 'minor bug fixes', 'tedious infrastructure', and 'endless meetings' suggests a pragmatic approach to problem-solving and efficient development.

phrases: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on using modern and 'top-notch' tools and patterns suggests a drive for innovation and taking ownership of building high-quality, up-to-date systems.
